name: CAVE (BirdSoup)
description:
This is a demo of "CAVE" , an HTML text-based RPG about surviving a snow waste post-apocalypse while living in an isolated cave with your wife, friend, and dog . Discover the story by interacting with your surroundings. 

Most of the game will take place while exploring outside the cave, but, currently, you may only make it so far as the entrance.  There is lore told through the existing items so it's not pointless to play as it is.

In the future it will be about survival and have a plot.
